title: Warhammer 40,000: Mechanicus - OST
description:
Immerse yourself in one of the most impressive soundtracks to leave the catacombs of Mars.
Your augmented ears will never be able to forget the wonders locked away within these 11 thematically tuned verses of the Omnissiah.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Immerse yourself in one of the most impressive soundtracks to leave the catacombs of Mars.
Your augmented ears will never be able to forget the wonders locked away within these 11 thematically tuned verses of the Omnissiah.
If you weren't already converted to the Cult Mechanicus, you certainly will be by the end of this near hour-long album.

All tracks are now available in FLAC lossless quality.
For those with less storage than an STC, there are MP3 files available

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# TRACK LISTING
<!--text-->
1. Children of the Omnissiah 1:46
2. Caestus Metalican 2:52
3. Lost Civilizations 3:26
4. Immortal Machine 0:58
5. Noosphere 6:28
6. Dance of the Cryptek 7:07
7. Millennial Rage 6:41
8. Warriors of Mars 4:29
9. Treacherous 9:02
10. Overlord 6:30
11. Binary Signal 6:47

<!--title-->
